sql.trim:
t1.id as id, date_format(t1.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createdAt, date_format(t1.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as updatedAt,
t1.user_id as userId, t1.course_id as courseId, t2.name as courseName, t3.name as courseTeacherName, t4.name as userName, t6.name as userTeacherName, concat(t5.grade, '级', t5.cls, '班') as className,
(select sum(s1.score) from stu_score s1 where s1.student_id = t1.user_id and s1.score > 0) as increaseScore, (select sum(s1.score) from stu_score s1 where s1.student_id = t1.user_id and s1.score < 0) as decreaseScore,
(select sum(s1.score) from stu_score s1 where s1.student_id = t1.user_id and s1.score > 0 and s1.course_id = #{attr2}) as increaseScore, (select sum(s1.score) from stu_score s1 where s1.student_id = t1.user_id and s1.score < 0 and s1.course_id = #{attr2}) as decreaseScore,

mapper.sql: from inter_user_course t1 left join course t2 on t1.course_id = t2.id left join user t3 on t2.teacher_id = t3.id left join user t4 on t1.user_id = t4.id left join cls t5 on t5.id = t4.class_id left join user t6 on t6.id = t5.teacher_id
mapper.insert: insert into inter_user_course (id, created_at, updated_at, course_id, user_id) values (#{id}, now(), now(), #{courseId}, #{userId})
